reviewText: Great movie but the image quality is not as good as expected even for none digital source.
Not what I thought it would be like.

Ann Jillian's character discovers that her husband isn't exactly who he says he is. She finds out that he is actually the son of a mafiaoso. when they're son is kidnapped, they are forced to seek out his father's help (portrayed by Charlton Heston.) Nice twist to things here.
Heston and Jillian give great performances in this originally aired TV movie.
I had seen this movie before and enjoyed it.  Therefore, I had to find it on DVD.  Chartom Heston and Ann Jillian were great in this movie.
